Secondary

Not "on the job"
There is a local that will be set on the node where the player accepts the job.
It will prevent this node from appearing again.
Player "on the job" and has some tach glands

The player will be allowed to threaten this guard twice. The first time will get a warning. The second time will result in an attack.
The condition should be set on the second branch following this node.
Initial selection
Set the "threaten" condition on this node, so that the next time the player threatens the guard, the above node is the path followed.

Goes hostile along with all his men.
